title_advert: ['Luxury villa with the biggest pool and plot']
descriptions: ["DescriptionAQUA properties presents this Luxury 5 bedroom villa in Sienna Lakes, Jumeirah Golf Estate. This stunning property has a massive built up area of around 7,600 sq.ft. and a plot area of 9,331 sq.ft. It comes complete with a large swimming pool and full landscaping that offer an ideal space for outdoor living and entertaining. It has five bedrooms with five bathrooms, a basement living room that is suitable for a gymnasium or home cinema, large open plan kitchen with a back kitchen or laundry and a maid's quarters.\nAqua Properties was founded in 2005, the main goal then as it still is today is to stand out from our competitors by offering our clientele the highest standards in client relations, extensive real estate knowledge and investment options. Since our inception, Aqua Properties has grown into a larger diverse real estate organisation offering a multitude of real estate services including development, project management, investment advisory, real estate supervision management services and international consulting services."]

title_advert: ['Brand New / Tip villa / Private beach access']
location1: ['Signature Villas Frond IDubai, Palm Jumeirah, Signature Villas']
descriptions:
['Description• BUA 13,755 sqft
 • Plot 13,000 sqft
 • Panoramic sea views
 • G +2 story Tip Mansion
 • Roof terrace
 • Infinity pool
 • 24 hour security
 • Available now
 • Contact Alexander +971508826124
Alexander at Dacha real estate is delighted to present to the market this Exquisite Tip Villa situated on Palm Jumeirah. 
This prime piece of luxury real estate boasts over 13,000 Sq.Ft. built up area and sits on a generous plot just over 13,000 Sq.Ft. The location is unbeatable for beach front living, arriving at the residence you have private access via a secure entry gate, in essence, you have two sets of security keeping your home safe, secure, and most certainly private. 
The moment you step inside you will appreciate that this truly is a step above the rest with a huge entrance atrium, glass floor to ceiling doors that open up onto the terrace, pool and private beach. 
The villa offers six generous bedrooms suits, a number of different living spaces from informal to impressive formal areas for guest entertaining. The villa also benefits a gymnasium with fully equipped sauna, cinema/chill room, games room, roof top terrace with Jacuzzi. Out in the rear garden you have a huge terrace and outdoor dining area situated next to the lap pool and Jacuzzi, evening sunsets will be second to none with the majestic Dubai Marina skyline and 360 degree sea view. 
To truly appreciate this property please calls Alexander today on: +971508826124.']
